Name: Complete Purchase of Apple Accessories with Shipping Information
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select Apple accessories, add to cart, and enter shipping information to complete the purchase.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over link accessories
Step 3: Click on link apple
Step 4: Click on button addToCart
Step 5: Click on input storageColorOption ( 512Gb)
Step 6: Click on input storageColorOption (yellow)
Step 7: Click on button buy
Step 8: Click on link placeOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 9: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page '/checkout/info'
Step 10: Click on input email
Step 11: Enter input value in input email
Step 12: Click on button continueToShipping -> Navigate to page '/checkout/shipping-address'
Step 13: Click on input firstName
Step 14: Enter input value in input firstName
Step 15: Click on input lastName
Step 16: Enter input value in input lastName
Step 17: Click on input address
Step 18: Enter input value in input address
Step 19: Click on input zipCode
Step 20: Enter input value in input zipCode
Step 21: Click on input city
Step 22: Enter input value in input city
Step 23: Click on input state
Step 24: Enter input value in input state
Step 25: Click on input phone
Step 26: Enter input value in input phone
Step 27: Click on button continueToPayment -> Navigate to page ''
Step 28: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Purchase Samsung Accessories with Price Filtering
Description: Navigate to the homepage, filter Samsung accessories by price, add to cart, and verify the homepage after completing the purchase.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over link accessories
Step 3: Click on link samsung2 -> Navigate to page '/category/power-and-cables'
Step 4: Click on input priceMin
Step 5: Enter input value in input priceMin
Step 6: Click on input priceMax
Step 7: Enter input value in input priceMax
Step 8: Click on input inStock
Step 9: Click on link sortOptions (byTitle)
Step 10: Click on link sortOptions (byPrice)
Step 11: Click on link samsungGalaxyS23UltraSmartviewCases -> Navigate to page '/product/*'
Step 12: Click on button purchaseActions (increased)
Step 13: Click on button purchaseActions (buy)
Step 14: Click on link accessories -> Navigate to page '/category/accessories'
Step 15: Click on button object
Step 16: Click on button addToCart
Step 17: Hover over link iphone15SiliconeCaseWithMagSafe
Step 18: Click on input accessoryType (iphone15)
Step 19: Click on input accessoryType (cypress)
Step 20: Click on button buy -> Navigate to page ''
Step 21: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
